extendedInfo.description: Take control over one of the powerful clans, fight against beasts and knights to create an impressive kingdom! Battles and Castles is turn-based strategy game based on such famous series as Heroes Of Might and Magic or Civilization. You will recruit knights, discover mines and treasures, build houses, stables, academies and fortifications to fulfill all the missions in campaign mode. All of this takes place in mysterious, fantasy medieval, complete 3D world. Features: - more than 20 different units including knights, archers, catapults, cannons, orcs and mages- about 20 different buildings and fortifications to make a powerful kingdom - 3 different technology levels - 2 campaign modes with 10 complex missions each - skirmish mode with AI players - multiplayer mode on one device - unique graphics and complete 3D world - game center support

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: When I load a saved game, I get a locked up screen and I can\'t do anything. If they can fix the glitch, it would be a fun game for the money. Looks like a medieval Lego castle siege game.
reviews.author: A. Nonymous

reviews.title: Don\'t Listen to Poor Reviews!!!
reviews.comment: Hands down the best turn-based strategy game I have ever played, and I\'ve played well over 50. The different unit types, the skill involved, the overall art work and the controls makes this game great...but what sets it apart and makes it the best turn-based strategy game ever, is the fact that you build and construct intricate fortresses which I\'ve never seen in this genre before. PLEASE ADD ONLINE MULTIPLAYER!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Christopher K.

reviews.title: needs updates
reviews.comment: AN UPDATE!!! Hallelujah! Love this gam, just wanted to see some of its glitchiness sorted.  From what I can see so far, done!!! No root access tho, that sux.  Ive bought ur game obviously.  could use more still...
reviews.author: Makaii Melissa

reviews.title: Harder than you think!
reviews.comment: I\'ve played the free version for a few months, but didn\'t wanted to buy until there was an update. I wanted to be sure the developer was still -well- developing. Good news, they are. If you like turn based strategy games, try this game, you will be impressed.  Developer: I didn\'t rate this at 5 stars because I think it needs to be sped up some and there needs to be more options in setup: ie speed controls for game and tilt, volume, etc. Also, I am fundamentally against in app purchasing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: Completed all the missions and now its boring is their online multiplayer?
reviews.author: Jonathan Munoz

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I only gave it 4 because I am hoping what is already a great game gets even better and bigger.  Love it!  EDIT: annoyed that my progress in the demo didn\'t carry over.  Super annoyed that Blue level 6 crashes when I try to load my save.  Acer A100.
reviews.author: Joshua Sprague

reviews.title: Needs work but has great bones
reviews.author: Jamie Hill

reviews.title: Great concept, needs a better AI
reviews.comment: Fantastic idea, well executed and no glitches for me, but lost its challenge relatively quickly because AI is rather dumb.  Fix that and throw in some more levels and this will be the best turn-based strategy game on Android.
reviews.author: Jonathan Hastings

reviews.title: Has potential, but...
reviews.comment: (A) it seems sorely misbalanced. The second level is insanely difficult without more gold and the only way to get gold at that point is to participate in clicking online \"offers.\" i would rather have IAPs than \"offers.\" (B) When pressing the Back button in a mission it leaves the mission without warning, losing any progress (done that twice by accident already). (C) The click zones are a tiny bit too small, making it tricky to click on the right unit. (D) It has locked up on me a couple times during the enemy\'s turn on the second mission. (E) Add a tutorial - most of the in-game UI is not all that intuitive (the icons seem ill-chosen to me). (F) add 1 MP to the units - only being able to move 2 dots per turn gets tedious. i love the theme/graphics, and would love to see this game given a bit a polish, but can\'t see myself playing it much as-is.
reviews.author: Stephan Beal

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Pretty cool game, although not multiplayer is only 1v1 hotseat not enough gold mines and VERY limited maps. They almost got it right but something in this game is missing; Look up Medieval Battlefields GREAT GAME!
reviews.author: Jake Versteeg

reviews.title: slooooooooooooow
reviews.comment: Love the game, but as the title says, too slow, next update, make it so you can speed through the opponents turn if you wish to.And get rid of the animations of your people attacking others, takes up far too much time, other than that, great game!!
reviews.author: Rob Davies

reviews.title: Bugarama!
reviews.comment: The game barely plays without crashing. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Jason Goff

reviews.title: doesn\'t work on imito mx2 with air mouse
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on imito mx2 with air mouse
reviews.author: simon spencer

reviews.title: Camera issue
reviews.comment: I\'ll give you 5 stars if you add online play over mobile data
reviews.author: damon richter

reviews.title: Great game but needs more features.
reviews.comment: Great game but dev should improve it by adding new features. And please add unlimited resources mode. Hate running out resources to build new building or units
reviews.author: MIKE LUNA

reviews.title: Great turn-based strategy game.
reviews.comment: Love this game, it reminds me of Age of empires for PC. Love how you can build bases. In future please add a way to disable rotation because it is annoying if you wanna lay down. Also add amound of days shown and possibly a Co-op mode where you and a friend can go against A.I.
reviews.author: Chris Gallon

reviews.title: A good game that just needs a little TLC (by dev)
reviews.comment: Battles and Castles is a pretty good game. I like the minimalistic graphics, and am thankful the developer didn\'t opt for little, squat, Warcraft style characters. The objectives aren\'t always clear, nor why you lost a particular battle, but with some patience you can figure things out. The user interface could definitely use some work, as things like current HP of an enemy is only shown during their turn, and tapping on the right spot can be tricky. But regardless, I feel like it was worth the money and am enjoying it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: needs some work
reviews.comment: Good game...but need to fix the exit situation..my finger slid over the back button and i automatically lost my progress...need to ask  to make sure i want to exit!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken!!!
reviews.comment: Cant finish game at 10th lvl. By the time you reach this far you cant refund.
reviews.author: Mike k
